gustmessage: Thank you for choosing our hospital for your healthcare needs. We constantly work to improve and meet your expectations. To serve our patients better, kindly spare a few minutes to fill out this feedback form. Your opinion is of immense value to us.

kpi_info: 24. PSQ4c - Time taken for discharge for the month of
kpi_def: The discharge process is deemed to have started when the consultant formally approves discharge and ends with the patient leaving the clinical unit.

formula_para1_i: Sum of time taken for discharge Insurance Patients
